## AFrameEnvAdapterOptions.getInteractableObjects property

Get a list of objects that can interact with a laser pointer (Other than teleport destination).

**Signature:**

```typescript
getInteractableObjects?: () => THREE.Object3D[] | undefined;
```

## Remarks

For XR Controllers
